alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 2:14PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pinal County through 300 PM MST... At 214 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Florence to near La Palma. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, La Palma, Blackwater, Arizola, Magma, Randolph, Coolidge Airport and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 187 and 199. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 175 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior
